full_summary:
================================ Traceability and Compliance - NSERC and SSHRC Job Description Writing Services 
-----------------------------------------------

### Tender Announcement

The Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council (NSERC) and the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council (SSHRC) invite you to submit a proposal for Job Description Writing Services on an as-and-when-required basis.

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-6135-34962985
*   **Solicitation Number**: NS24-20230323
*   **Tender Closing Date**: Tuesday, June 20, 2023, 2:00 PM
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 04, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: July 03, 2024
*   **Procurement Category**: BEN-COM
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive Procurement
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Selection Criteria**: Technical Merit and Price

### Services Required

NSERC and SSHRC require Job Description Writing Services on an as-and-when-required basis. Services should encompass the writing, editing, and review of job descriptions.

### Proposed Categories

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCOL)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement 
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

Job Description Writing Services will be delivered to support the operations of NSERC and SSHRC, primarily located in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Mandatory Requirements

To be eligible to participate in this tendering opportunity, your organization must comply with the requirements outlined in the solicitation document.

### Contracting Entity Information

*   Name: Canadian Federal Government
*   Address: 125 Zaida Eddy Private, Ottawa, Ontario KL9 0E3
*   Contact Name: Tamara Bennett
*   Contact Email: [tenders@nserc-crsng.gc.ca](mailto:tenders@nserc-crsng.gc.ca)
*   Contact Phone Number: 343-563-1961

### Additional Information

All documents related to this tender can be found online. Your responses should be sent to the above contact information.
